summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5119 for the improvement of 46th Avenue South, as deeded to the city by deed from A. E. Koepfli, across Block 50, Maynard's Lake Washington Addition, between Bradford Street and Charlestown Street, by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 58949, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
